medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What am I?
medium.hint: Think of a word that changes when you add letters.

hard.q: A farmer has a bucket with water. He asks you to move it from the left side of a fence to the right side without spilling. You can only carry it once and you may cross the fence twice using one action. How can you do it?
hard.a: Lift the bucket over the fence in one go; move it to the other side without spilling.
hard.hint: Consider the meaning of 'crossing' and how you can move objects across boundaries.
